title: Mobile Microlearning Courses for European Educational Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English proficiency and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A language learning course centered on European cross-country educational collaboration, emphasizing fragmented learning modules via mobile devices and collaborative activities with peer learners.

learning_goals: Learners can understand educational collaboration cases from three or more European countries and explain key terminology.
Learners complete five or more microlearning modules per week via a mobile platform and achieve a score of 80% or higher on quizzes.
Learners engage in three or more discussion activities in virtual collaborative groups and submit a draft design for a European collaborative project.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
